attributes.action: make it law that each food establishment in the UK must display a report in their premises which has been written be the environmental health detailing all results of their last inspection to their establishment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From takeaway to fine dining, we all eat out regularly.  Every time we eat out, we could be putting ourselves and loved ones at risk.

If ALL food establishment owners had to display their environmental health report to their customers, not only would the public be informed of the establishments hygiene record, but this will also encourage owners to act on what what are suitable hygiene standards.
